additional_notes: The document is a scanned image of four 'Important Message' forms. The forms contain handwritten notes with dates ranging from 4/20/05 to 4/26/05, and a stamped date of 07/26/17. The document is part of a larger collection, as indicated by 'Page 98 of 100'.
